sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Sheep</radical> are always looking at the <radical>next</radical> animal, full of <kanji>envy</kanji> and <kanji>jealousy</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Picture a sheep comparing itself to the next creature, and feeling deep envy and jealousy. Why does it feel that way?
readingMnemonic: The reason the sheep feels such <kanji>envy</kanji> and <kanji>jealousy</kanji> is that the next creature is a <reading>cen</reading>taur (<ja>せん</ja>)! Who wouldn't be jealous of a creature as noble as a centaur?
readingInfo: Being a centaur is every sheep's dream, so they can't help feeling terrible jealousy when they see one.
